channel.title: Image Completion on ChuanXia Zheng
channel.description: Recent content in Image Completion on ChuanXia Zheng

item.title: Pluralistic Image Completion
item.description: Pluralistic Online Demo Notes: The Pluralistic model provides multiple and diverse plausible results by clicking the Fill button. For large holes, we can click the Mask Type to select the Rectangle holes. For free-form line, the left slider can be used to set the line width [1,50]. If we just mask half (left/right) of the face, the diversity will be small for our short+long term attention layer will copy the information from the other slides.
